wsdl:operation.name: GetSystemStatus
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets the status of the system.

wsdl:operation.name: CountUsersByConstraint
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets the number of users of a List that correspond to the passed Constraint.

wsdl:operation.name: CountUsersByFilter
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets the number of users of a List that correspond to the passed Filter.

wsdl:operation.name: GetUsersByFilter
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets the ID values of users of a List that correspond to the passed Filter and MaxCount.

wsdl:operation.name: GetUsersByConstraint
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets the ID values of users of a List that correspond to the passed Constraint and MaxCount.

wsdl:operation.name: GetUsersXmlByConstraint
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets users for a certain List given the Constraint to filter the results as XML.

wsdl:operation.name: GetUserByFilter
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets a user's properties for the given List and Filter.

wsdl:operation.name: GetUserByConstraint
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets a user's properties for the given List and Constraint.

wsdl:operation.name: GetUserByID
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets a user's properties for the given List and UserID

wsdl:operation.name: UpdateUser
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Updates the properties for a user for the given UserID in the given list.

wsdl:operation.name: UpdateUsers
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Updates multiple users at the time.

wsdl:operation.name: CreateUser
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Creates a new user for the given list

wsdl:operation.name: RetrieveHashForUser
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets the HashCode for a user with given UserID in a List.

wsdl:operation.name: TriggerCampaignForUser
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Triggers a campaign for a specific user.

wsdl:operation.name: TriggerCampaignForUserWithResult
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Triggers a campaign for a specific user.

wsdl:operation.name: TriggerCampaignForUserAndActionListItem
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Triggers a campaign for a specific user using a specific actionlist record.

wsdl:operation.name: TriggerCampaignForUserAndActionListItemWithResult
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Triggers a campaign for a specific user using a specific actionlist record.

wsdl:operation.name: TriggerCampaign
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Triggers a Campaign.

wsdl:operation.name: TriggerCampaignWithResult
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Triggers a Campaign.

wsdl:operation.name: TriggerCampaignByXml
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Triggers a Campaign.

wsdl:operation.name: TriggerCampaignByXmlWithResult
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Triggers a Campaign.

wsdl:operation.name: GetPlannendCampaigns
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets the campaigns that are scheduled to run.

wsdl:operation.name: TriggerChannelForUser
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Triggers a Channel for a certain user by the name of the channel.

wsdl:operation.name: TriggerChannel
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Triggers a channel by its name.

wsdl:operation.name: GetListID
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets the id of a list using its name.

wsdl:operation.name: GetLists
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets the lists.

wsdl:operation.name: GetSegmentRecordCount
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets the amount of recipients in a segment.

wsdl:operation.name: GetSegments
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets the segments for a specified list.

wsdl:operation.name: CreateSegment
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Creates a new static segment for a list.

wsdl:operation.name: CreateSegmentInfolder
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Creates a new static segment for a list in a folder.

wsdl:operation.name: AddToSegment
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Adds a list of ids to a segment.

wsdl:operation.name: CreateActionList
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Creates a new ActionList.

wsdl:operation.name: AddRecordsToActionList
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Adds a new batch of records to an ActionList

wsdl:operation.name: AddRecordToActionList
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Adds a new record to an ActionList

wsdl:operation.name: GetActionLists
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns an overview of the ActionLists that are available

wsdl:operation.name: AddActionCode
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Adds a new ActionCode for an actionlist

wsdl:operation.name: AddActionCodes
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Adds multiple ActionCodes at once for an actionlist

wsdl:operation.name: GetActionCodes
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets all Action Codes for an action list.
